title: Conqueror of the League Emote
body:
I just patched, and this mission says "you've put in serious hours on the rift".
I haven't.

I have put in serious hours on the Abyss.

Rito plz.

replies.body: How do you know how many hours you put in?
Just checked - that is a lot of ARAM! Congrats! {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:30}}

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RPdlWEzw,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-11-07T23:19:52.571+0000)
>
> Just checked - that is a lot of ARAM! Congrats! {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:30}}

Only 7100 or so games, I could try harder.
